description: This list contains information on medallion vehicles that are currently inactive. The reason codes for an inactive medallion status are as follows: OOB for Out of Business, PEN for Pending, REV for Revoked, STO for In Storage and SUS for Suspended (Note: Reason for Suspension is also supplied).

metadata.description: This list contains information on medallion vehicles that are currently inactive. The reason codes for an inactive medallion status are as follows: OOB for Out of Business, PEN for Pending, REV for Revoked, STO for In Storage and SUS for Suspended (Note: Reason for Suspension is also supplied). This list is accurate to the date and time represented in the Last Date Updated and Last Time Updated fields.

name: Medallion Vehicles - Inactive
